com.nhaarman.listviewanimations.itemmanipulation.swipedismiss.undo

Interface UndoCallback

  • All Superinterfaces:
    OnDismissCallback
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SimpleSwipeUndoAdapter, TimedUndoAdapter

    public interface UndoCallback
extends OnDismissCallback
    A callback interface used to inform its client about a successful dismissal of one or more list item positions.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      View getPrimaryView(View view)
      Returns the primary View contained in given View.
      View getUndoView(View view)
      Returns the undo View contained in given View.
      void onDismiss(View view, int position)
      Called when the user has definitively dismissed an item.
      Do NOT remove the item from the adapter here! Instead do this in OnDismissCallback.onDismiss(android.widget.AbsListView, int[]).
      void onUndoShown(View view, int position)
      Called when the undo View is shown for given position.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.nhaarman.listviewanimations.itemmanipulation.OnDismissCallback

        onDismiss

    • Method Detail

      • getPrimaryView

        View getPrimaryView(View view)
        Returns the primary View contained in given View.
        Parameters:
        view - the parent View, which contains both the primary and the undo Views.

      • getUndoView

        View getUndoView(View view)
        Returns the undo View contained in given View.
        Parameters:
        view - the parent View, which contains both the primary and the undo Views.

      • onUndoShown

        void onUndoShown(View view,
               int position)
        Called when the undo View is shown for given position.
        Parameters:
        view - the parent View, which contains both the primary and the undo Views.
        position - the position for which the undo View is shown.

      • onDismiss

        void onDismiss(View view,
             int position)
        Called when the user has definitively dismissed an item.
        Do NOT remove the item from the adapter here! Instead do this in OnDismissCallback.onDismiss(android.widget.AbsListView, int[]).
        Parameters:
        view - the parent View, which contains both the primary and the undo Views.
        position - the position of the item that is dismissed.
